name: OhMyWitch!
description:
It is the first year I have the chance to join the Halloween parade. BUT WHY THE MONSTER KIDNAPPED ME TO THE OTHER WORLD?! And this charming monster wants me to be his Witch. What should I do?!

*It is just the first part of the story. Please stay tuned, and look forward to the further update!

某一個萬聖節晚上，原來滿心歡喜參加慶典的你，竟然被怪物之王綁架到異世界了?!

不止如此，他還要求你成為為他解咒的專屬女巫! 雖然要求極之無理，但怪物的溫柔和周遭的神奇事物令你停下腳步。究竟你會如何選擇?

*此版本是故事的第一章節，敬請期待後續更新!

♥5k words♥

♥6 CGs♥

♥2 endings♥

♥Partial voice acting♥

♥custom name♥

♥5000字文本♥

♥6張CG♥

♥兩個結局♥

♥部份聲音演出♥

♥自訂主角名字♥

♥5k words♥

♥6 CGs♥

Available Languages: English (US), 繁體中文

The English translation of this version is not perfect. I will fix it in the future update. Please forgive me.

此版本的英文翻譯不完美，之後將會在更新時作進一步改進，望見諒

The whole game was done by myself!

For the music, sound, and some background assets I used in the game：

Music: DOVA-SYNDROME

SFX: soundeffect-lab

Background resources: Aipict

VO: Japanese Anime Voices by ボイスレック

♥If you like this game, please leave a comment or give me a 5-star rating♥

I will update the development of further chapters on my Twitter(https://twitter.com/RiceOtomecoffee)free feel to follow me if you are interested!
